msbt.message: Ugh, that Gulliver He's out there, sleepin' on the beach again.Give 'im a hard time for me, if you happen to trip over him. Gahaha!
I heard that K.K.'s gonna be playin' in front of Resident Services today!They say he's gonna play requests from the crowd later on, so I might go try to sneak one in for myself
I heard Label's here on the island. I get that she wants to match her outfits to her customers, butthat way she measures you up and down with her eyes is kinda unsettlin', .
I hear tell that Saharah character is visitin' .She's a bit of an oddball, but she sells classy stuff, .
Did you hear? K.K.'s performin' outside in our plaza today!He's even takin' requests, so if you got any tunes you really wanna hear, now's your chance, !
I just saw little Daisy Mae She's got some good turnips today!
There's a big, ugly boat anchored up north all sly-like, .I don't trust it. Be sure to keep your wits about you if you're thinking of goin' aboard, kiddo.

I keep getting the feelin' that there's somethin'supernatural followin' me around, lately. you don't suppose I could've been cursed, do you?Now that I think about it, my knees and my back've been all achyWait, what am I sayin'? That ain't nothin' new.
Why aren't you in the island plaza?<10_4 /> I thought K.K.â€”uh, I mean Not gonna say another word! If you're curious, you'll just have to go check it out for yourself!

Have you been over to the plaza? I heard K.K.'s puttin' on a show! Not just any show, neither They say it's a birthday concert for some lucky so-an'-soThat's one slick way to celebrate! Just like K.K., givin' back to his fans.
You heard, ?<10_4 /> Mabel's here on the island today.She seems prickly at first, but she's nice, once you get to know her Just like yours truly! Gahaha!
I just met that C.J. character Seems like a friendly enough kiddo. Gonna try to catch him some fish?
Seems Flick's come by for a visit. If he's here for bugs and other crawlies, he's welcome to 'em.
Heard that Kicks character is here sellin' stuff in our plaza today.He's usually got some top-notch shoes and bags, .
So I guess Celeste is here, if you're lookin' for someone to explain the stars in the sky to you, .

Question for ya, kiddo Is it just me, or are folks seemin' a mite on edge lately, ?Like so-and-so sayin' they heard noises or saw something or being afraid of pickin' after dark. Everyone's all worked up about some kinda something they think's gonna come hoppin' up any second now.Well, I ain't seen or heard nothin'! It's all a lot of hooey if you ask me!Today's just another mighty fine day exactly like D-did you hear that?!I'm sure that was just the wind playin' tricks. Gotta be. Gahaha!
I hear Leif has turned up at the plaza. Wonder what kinda rare greenery he'll have on paw? Guess I'll have to mosey over there and take a look-see. Good reason as any to stretch my legs, .
Just saw someone I didn't recognize. Can't say that happens to me much.
